TcmtEventBits.hh

00001 #ifndef TcmtEventBits_hh
00002 #define TcmtEventBits_hh 1
00003 
00004 #include "BitSet.hh"
00005 
00006 namespace CALICE {
00007 
00008 
00016   class TcmtEventBits : public BitSet {
00017   protected:
00018     enum ETcmtEventBitNo { kMinNumberMuonLikeTowers,  
00019                            kMaxNumberMuonLikeTowers,  
00020                            kMinNumberMuonLikeLayers,  
00021                            kMaxNumberTotalHitsMuon,   
00022                            kMinNumberTotalHitsMuon,   
00023                            kMaxSumEnergyMuon,         
00024                            kMinSumEnergyMuon,         
00025                            kNumberOfBits}; // just to count the number of bits
00026 
00027   public:
00033     TcmtEventBits() : BitSet(kNumberOfBits) {}
00034 
00040     TcmtEventBits(const int value) : BitSet(kNumberOfBits, value) {}
00041 
00046     bool hasMinNumberMuonLikeTowers() { return getBit(kMinNumberMuonLikeTowers); }
00051     bool hasMaxNumberMuonLikeTowers() { return getBit(kMaxNumberMuonLikeTowers); }
00056     bool hasMinNumberMuonLikeLayers() { return getBit(kMinNumberMuonLikeLayers); }
00061     bool hasMinNumberHitsMuon()       { return getBit(kMinNumberTotalHitsMuon); }
00066     bool hasMaxNumberHitsMuon()       { return getBit(kMaxNumberTotalHitsMuon); }
00071     bool hasMinSumEnergyMuon()        { return getBit(kMinSumEnergyMuon); }
00076     bool hasMaxSumEnergyMuon()        { return getBit(kMaxSumEnergyMuon); }
00077 
00081     bool isMuon() {
00082       return ( getBit(kMinNumberMuonLikeTowers) &&
00083                getBit(kMaxNumberMuonLikeTowers) &&
00084                getBit(kMinNumberMuonLikeLayers) &&
00085                getBit(kMinNumberTotalHitsMuon) &&
00086                getBit(kMaxNumberTotalHitsMuon) &&
00087                getBit(kMinSumEnergyMuon) &&
00088                getBit(kMaxSumEnergyMuon) );
00089     }
00090 
00094      bool isPedestal() {
00095        return ( ( ! getBit(kMinNumberTotalHitsMuon) ) &&
00096                  getBit(kMaxNumberTotalHitsMuon) &&
00097                ( ! getBit(kMinSumEnergyMuon) ) &&
00098                  getBit(kMaxSumEnergyMuon) );
00099      }
00100 
00104      bool isLeakage() {
00105        return (    ( getBit(kMinNumberTotalHitsMuon) &&  getBit(kMinSumEnergyMuon) ) // not pedestal
00106                && (
00107                    ( ! getBit(kMinNumberMuonLikeLayers) && ( ! getBit(kMinNumberMuonLikeTowers) || getBit(kMaxNumberMuonLikeTowers) ) ) // not at all muon like shape
00108                    || ( ! ( getBit(kMaxNumberTotalHitsMuon) &&  getBit(kMaxSumEnergyMuon) ) ) // or too large signal for muon
00109                   )
00110                );
00111      }
00112 
00113     void setMinNumberMuonLikeTowers(bool state) { return setBit(kMinNumberMuonLikeTowers, state); }
00114     void setMaxNumberMuonLikeTowers(bool state) { return setBit(kMaxNumberMuonLikeTowers, state); }
00115     void setMinNumberMuonLikeLayers(bool state) { return setBit(kMinNumberMuonLikeLayers, state); }
00116     void setMinNumberHitsMuon(bool state)       { return setBit(kMinNumberTotalHitsMuon, state); }
00117     void setMaxNumberHitsMuon(bool state)       { return setBit(kMaxNumberTotalHitsMuon, state); }
00118     void setMinSumEnergyMuon(bool state)        { return setBit(kMinSumEnergyMuon, state); }
00119     void setMaxSumEnergyMuon(bool state)        { return setBit(kMaxSumEnergyMuon, state); }
00120 
00121   };
00122 
00123 
00124 }

00126 
00127 #endif
